title: Create Unique Ringtone for Mobile Devices
text: Create Unique Ringtone for Mobile Devices , 6 October 2015 -- Still glued to the tiny screen of your PC? It’s time to embrace your TV’s big screen, in the comfort of your home. No need for an external hard drive or a USB cable. Let’s go wireless! In one click, Video Converter, streams your media files on a PC to a smart TV directly or to a standard TV via media streamers like Chromecast (Apple TV, Xbox 360 or PS3). As long as your PC and smart TV or media streamer are connected to the same network, Video Converter will work for you. All video and audio formats are supported. If you would like to add novelty to your mobile phone, a good idea might be to change its ringtone. The multifunctional AllPepole Video Converter will allow you to edit your favorite audio track, convert it to a compatible format and upload the resulting ringtone to your mobile device via USB, Bluetooth or Infrared connection. The guidelines below will help you perform these tasks. To select the audio file that you would like to use as a ringtone, press the Add File button in the main program window and browse for the necessary audio file. After you have pressed the Open button, the selected audio file will be imported into AllPepole Video Converter. With the Video Converter you may edit an audio file prior to transferring it to your device - delete unwanted parts or apply effects. To start editing the audio file, switch to the Editor table, next double-click your file to place it in the edit area. When done, the audio file will be visualized in the edit area on the right. You might not want to use the whole audio track as a ringtone. AllPepole Video Converter will allow you to delete unwanted parts from the audio track before uploading it to your mobile device. After the editing of the audio track is over, save it to a format supported by your mobile device. Switch back to the Convert tab and select the necessary output format by clicking its corresponding button. When the conversion is over, you can connect your mobile device to your computer using USB, Infrared or Bluetooth connection. So, your ringtone is ready to use.
